ygData.subject: Re: [eqenchanters] A question about the Tashania quest
ygData.msgSnippet: The vendors in the librarty are pretty impartial. When I ran the quest, I had horrid faction with the guards as well, So I stripped and gave it a whirl.  I
ygData.messageBody:
The vendors in the librarty are pretty impartial. When
I ran the quest, I had horrid faction with the guards
as well, So I stripped and gave it a whirl. I invised
all the way to the library, then gave Mar his money
and stuff, and had no trouble. I gated out right from
there.

--- eantravis@... wrote:
> I know every detail of the quest to get the Tashania
> spell, but one part
> worries me. I am currently KOS to most faction
> groups in Neriak (even with
> Illusion: Dark Elf and Benevolence) because of my
> religion (Erollisi Marr)
> and a few unfortunate run-ins with the Neriak Guard
> population. One part of
> the Tashania quest reqiuires that I see Mizr N'Mar
> in the Neriak Library to
> get my glowing coin of Tash converted into a
> gleaming coin of Tash. Will I
> be able to do this without dropping invis? Being
> invis is basically the
> only way I can roam Neriak unmolested, and I am
> usure if initiating a trade
> with an NPC will cause my invisibility to drop. I am
> pretty sure that would
> be the case, and being killed by angry NPCs in the
> Neriak Library really
> doesnt appeal to me...
>
> I would appreciate some advice from anyone that has
> completed this quest.
> Am I right to think that initiating a trade with an
> NPC will make you
> appear? If so, does anyone know what faction group
> Mizr and the surrounding
> NPCs belong to? And is there anyway that I can raise
> my faction with this
> group? Any help would be appreciated :)
>
>
> Timn the Enchanter
> 43rd level, Erollisi Marr
> "There are some who call me . . . Timn?"
>
>
>
> ================================
> Ean Travis
>
> \\|//
> (o o)
> ------o00o-(_)-o00o-----
> "Someday your ship will come in
> and you will be waiting at the airport."
> -The Book of How, Vol. II:
> The Gospel According to Matthias-
>
>
